DOC.brief_summary: The SUCCESS Trial design determine whether Solace Bladder Control System safe effective treatment Stress Urinary Incontinence ( SUI ) adult female .
DOC.brief_title: Solace Stress Urinary inContinence Control Efficacy Safety Study
DOC.detailed_description: Subject undergo treatment Solace Bladder Control System sham procedure , result compare 3 month . All patient undergo sham treatment treat 3 month .
DOC.criteria: Female 18 year age old stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) Experienced SUI least 12 month attempt fail prior noninvasive treatment Willing undergo cystoscopic procedure require 36 month followup On stable medication minimum 3 month Free local genital skin infection Positive Pad Weight Test Free impassable urethral stricture , trauma necrosis Pregnant planning become pregnant study period Nonambulatory bedridden physically unable complete test exercise Morbidly obese ( defined BMI â‰¥ 40 kg/m2 ) Incontinence neurogenic etiology Urge predominant Mixed Incontinence Bladder infection ( include bladder inflammation edema ) Urinary Tract Infection ( UTI ) within 3 month History recurrent urinary tract infection Prior surgical procedure incontinence within past 6 month Is take medication urinary incontinence anticholinergic History recurrent ( > 1 ) recent ( within 5 year ) kidney stone ( ) Has prosthetic heart valve Unable tolerate form antibiotic Taking anticoagulation therapy , aspirin Has urinary incontinence due Intrinsic Sphincter Deficiency ( ISD )
